speech:
*Lodging allowance can be claimed only if an Associate stays over night at the place of visit.
* All lodging allowances are excluding taxes.
*If an Associate makes his/her own arrangement for lodging, they can claim on the food allowance and not the other allowances like stay and laundry.
* In which ever city, guest house accommodations are available; the Associate must stay at the guest house only. When rooms are not available in the guest house, the associate is permitted to avail hotel accommodation as per the eligibility.
* The journey duration must be more than 8 Hours in order to claim incidental allowance and if the travel duration is less than 8 hours but more than 4 hours, they can claim 50% of the mentioned allowance.
*Laundry allowance can be availed only for a trip which has a minimum of 4 (Four) nights stay. In order to claim the laundry expenses, the Associate must submit the laundry bills.
